titles: On that devout and industrious gentelman, George Monteith, merchant in Edinburgh, who departed this life the 2. day of Juny [sic], 1685. A funeral elegie. / N. Paterson.
author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
